title: Digital Fury Gaming
body:
Hello, Digital furry is currently looking for players from the range of Gold to Diamond players to join our team, we plan on playing weekly 5v5 tournaments and are in need of some dedicated players to join.

Requirements

-16+ years old.
-Some type of mic voice device.

Any questions feel free to add me in game

replies.body: Always ready for a hardcore gaming sesh with some fellow Furries.
